Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Western
ShortDescription: 78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Western, Irving Park, California, and Montrose due to, street blockage at Montrose/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Montrose, Western, Irving Park, California, and Montrose due to, street blockage at Montrose/Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 StateTemporary Northbound Reroute near Illinois/Rush
ShortDescription: Northbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Ohio, Fairbanks and Illinois: due to,street blockage near Illinois/Rush.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound # 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Ohio, Fairbanks and Illinois: due to,street blockage near Illinois/Rush.

Southbound  buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Illinois/Rush
ShortDescription: Eastbound 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Illinois, State, Ohio and Fairbanks: due to, street blockage near Illinois/Rush.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Illinois, State, Ohio and Fairbanks: due to, street blockage near Illinois/Rush.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
